title: Rajputana Ruby Polki Choker: A Regal Bridal Adornment
features: A meticulously crafted polki pendant forms the focal point, surrounded by four rows of strung ruby beads. The pendant features an intricately floral motif with polki diamonds set in a closed setting, typical of Mughal-inspired jewelry. The central ruby is bezel-set and beautifully carved. The choker also features delicate ruby bead and pearl dangles, adding a touch of ethereal charm. The 'ghat' or stringing style is traditional Telugu craftsmanship ensuring comfort and elegance.

description: This choker is an exquisite blend of traditional craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The use of high-quality rubies and uncut polki diamonds makes it a valuable investment. The Hyderabadi polish adds a unique luster and character. Its design is culturally significant, evoking the opulence of royal heritage, and can be passed down as a treasured heirloom. This is more than just jewelry; it's a piece of art with a story.
